definition[0]: a powerful person or organization that secretly pays and controls another person or organization
example[0]: The assassinâ€™s paymasters were never identified.
definition[1]: someone who is responsible for giving people their wages that they are owed, for example an official in a factory or the army
definition[2]: a person or organization responsible for giving people their wages or the money they are owed
example[1]: Paychecks are routed to an employee through their department paymaster.
definition[3]: someone powerful who pays other people to do something illegal or dangerous for them
